title: Example visualizations using the euroleague data
text: Takeaway: Teams many Final Four appearances aren’t always titles. example, teams consistent contenders rarely convert appearances championships.
code: # Convert to data.table dt <- as.data.table(euroleague_basketball)  # Convert columns to numeric dt[, Titles_Won_num := as.numeric(Titles_Won)] dt[, FinalFour_num := as.numeric(FinalFour_Appearances)]  labels <- dt[FinalFour_Appearances > 0]  # Plot ggplot(dt, aes(x = Titles_Won_num, y = FinalFour_num)) +               geom_point(color = "#295466", size = 3) +          geom_text_repel(         data = labels,         aes(label = Team),         size = 3     ) +          labs(         title = "EuroLeague Titles vs Final Four Appearances",         x = "Titles Won",         y = "Final Four Appearances"      ) +          theme_minimal(base_family = "Candara") +          theme(         panel.grid.major = element_line(linewidth = 0.45, color = "grey85", lineend = "round"),         panel.grid.minor = element_line(             linewidth = 0.35,              color = "grey85",              linetype = "dashed",              lineend = "round"         ),                  plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20),                  plot.background = element_rect(fill = "grey93", color = NA)     )

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: Cleaned information Euroleague teams: home cities, arenas, capacities, historical performance (Final Four appearances titles).

title: Euroleague Basketball Teams Data — euroleague_basketball
text: data frame following variables: Team Basketball team name (character). Home city City team based (character). Arena Arena(s) used team (character). Capacity Seating capacity; kept character commas (e.g., "10,000"). Last season Team placement recent completed season (character). Country Country team located (character). FinalFour_Appearances Number Final Four appearances (character, scraped/cleaned). Titles_Won Number Euroleague titles won (character, scraped/cleaned). Years_of_FinalFour_Appearances Comma-separated years Final Four appearances (character). Years_of_Titles_Won Comma-separated years titles (character).
